content: I proposed in #79169 to rename rustc_ty and use the name for the WIP extraction of the type library from rustc_middle. I have 2 questions: would this change require an MCP? and what would be the new name of the current rustc_ty?
As I understand it, that crate contains utility functions about types. Would something like rustc_ty_util make sense?
hmm, I think the rename is fine, but an MCP is probably appropriate here
I think I'm going to just open a MCP since doesn't take a lot of time to file...
To add to this, should splitting out stuff to rustc_ty_library require an MCP?
@nikomatsakis see this thread and the linked MCP thread
Happened to find this. I've been working on expanding the rustc_middle docs. I think I'll continue to do that. I'm also happy to help with documenting the new rustc_ty library.
